description:
This durable anorak serves as a robust layer offering breathability and weather resistance for spring and summer missions. The simple design won’t get in the way of a harness, and the stretch fabric allows for dynamic movements in mountain environments. For those who demand nothing but a direct route to the summit, the Bergtagen Stretch Half Zip will get you there.

  • Made from breathable, abrasion resistant double-weave stretch fabric
  • Fabric has built in 4-way mechanical stretch to move with you
  • Half-length zip allows venting to keep things cool when you’re working hard
  • Fitted hood with elastic binding fits well with a helmet
name: Fjallraven Bergtagen Stretch Half Zip - Men's
